meta.description: Meet Lynne McTaggart - investigative journalist, author, and public speaker. Learn more about McTaggart's influential work and research with Gaia.

title: Lynne McTaggart
cleaned_text:
Transforming the lives of thousands around the world through her talks and workshops, Lynne McTaggart is an investigative journalist, author, and public speaker.

The author of six books, including "The Intention Experiment" and "The Field," Lynne McTaggart is a spokesperson on consciousness, the new physics, and the practices of conventional and alternative medicine. The hallmark of her work is exhaustive research that produces science-based discoveries in the worlds of science, spirituality, and health. An avid anti-vaccinationist, McTaggart promotes her beliefs in her book "What Doctors Don't Tell You."

Lynne McTaggart is also an accomplished broadcaster, who has appeared on many national TV and radio shows.
